laboratory_examinations.findings: Before treatment: 17 nmol/L (normal range: 25–120 nmol/L); After 3 months of treatment: 39 nmol/L (normal range: 25–120 nmol/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 17 nmol/L to 39 nmol/L after 3 months of consuming UVB-irradiated mushrooms.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Before treatment: 9.30 pmol/L (normal range: 1.60–6.90 pmol/L); After 3 months of treatment: 5.60 pmol/L (normal range: 1.60–6.90 pmol/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 9.30 pmol/L to 5.60 pmol/L after 3 months of consuming UVB-irradiated mushrooms.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Before treatment: 2.16 mmol/L (normal range: 2.15–2.55 mmol/L); After 3 months of treatment: 2.25 mmol/L (normal range: 2.15–2.55 mmol/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 2.16 mmol/L to 2.25 mmol/L after 3 months of consuming UVB-irradiated mushrooms.
